subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Manny Fernandez made 30 saves to remain perfect at home and the Boston Bruins extended their winning streak to 10 games Thursday with a 4-2 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: Manny Fernandez made 30 saves to remain perfect at home and the Boston Bruins extended their winning streak to 10 games Thursday with a 4-2 victory against the Pittsburgh Penguins.
